org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp

Class SelectedYearBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.SelectedYearBlock

  • public class SelectedYearBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    passive structure holding data regarding the selected year and its timestamps
